text: I Wake Up Screaming is a 1941 American psychological crime movie directed by H. Bruce Humberstone and was based on the novel of the same name. It stars Betty Grable, Victor Mature, Carole Landis, Allyn Joslyn, Laird Cregar, Chick Chandler, Cyril Ring and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1941 crime movies Category:1940s psychological movies Category:American crime movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by H. Bruce Humberstone Category:20th Century Fox movies
title: I Wake Up Screaming
